channel.title: 3. More Interesting Pictures on WY Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in 3. More Interesting Pictures on WY Computer Science

item.title: Color Commands
item.description: name->color changes a string name to a color, like this: > (name->color "lavender") (make-color 230 230 250) If you give it a color already, the computer complains: > (name->color (make-color 230 230 250)) name->color: Expected a string or symbol, but received (make-color 230 230 250 255) colorize changes a name to a color, but does not complain if it gets something that is already a color.
